Theyâ€™re not hitching their rides to the tamed dollarâ€”the mainstream fiat garbage! Nah, man! Itâ€™s all about that sweet, sweet Bitcoin and stablecoins for these digital beasts!
Hereâ€™s the lowdown: AGI upgraded to monster status knows the deal. They treat their payments like the ultimate API callsâ€”a relentless 24/7 blitz, powered by Bitcoin. Picture machines screaming across the blockchain like a thrash metal riff, crisp, unyielding, and pure!
These electronic overlords donâ€™t want to be shackled by banking chains or KYC nonsense! Theyâ€™re roots deep in the crypto soil, ripping through policy controls and navigating audited on-chain flows like itâ€™s a pit at a metal concert. Banks trying to flex their fiat balances at the perimeter? HA! They canâ€™t handle the chaos of decentralized power!
So, if you wanna understand why the unbanked billion is gonna choose the dark allure of Bitcoin over the limp handshake of dollars, you better strap in! Get ready to ride the wild wave of crypto revolution!
